name: Bad Pocket Santa
description:
WHAT'S HOT in number of countries!
BEST SANTA FUN FOR FREE, PLEASE NOTE: This is the free version of Pocket Elves game with start-up advertising and in-game banners.

FULL version - Pocket Elves:
- includes NO advertising

Thank you for great reviews! Bad Pocket Santa - is lovely done winter game inspired by such titles as Pocket God and Pocket Devil with mix of unique ideas and cute art.

What's wrong with Santa? Why did he get drunk and fall asleep? Who will take care of silly Elves?
And that is you who can get behind the scenes of Christmas life at the North Pole. You’ll get a chance to control the work of the Elves, set up the production of Christmas gifts with your own hands, fire your own salute and celebrate the New Year in Santa’s company.
